articles.author: Danish Khan, Devina Sengupta, ET Telecom
articles.title: Nokia layoffs: Global rightsizing to affect 1000-1500 India employees over next couple of years - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: Nokia had 20,511 employees in the Asia Pacific region, of which 15,000 employees were based in India in 2020. The company’s net sales in India fell from 1,348 million euros to 944 million euros in 2020. It had reported 1,629 million euros in net sales in 2018…
articles.content:
